text: This game flopped and received mostly average reviews, so I'm not holding out hope for a sequel. It's unfortunate since I loved it, but I'm sure glad I bought the game when I saw it for 5 bucks. It's surely going to stay in my collection. It also has one of the best soundtracks of the past years, really.
